ComicInfo.Title: Here's Negan: Chapter 2; Prince of Cats; Mammon
ComicInfo.Summary:
Image+ is an all-new monthly magazine featuring Image's upcoming releases, as well as bonus creator-owned comics content. Each issue will be distributed with Diamond's monthly PREVIEWS Catalog and will feature an original, four-page The Walking Dead story concerning Negan's origins, and created by New York Times bestselling team Robert Kirkman and Charlie Adlard, for a total of 48 pages of backstory. Image+ will also showcase interviews, spotlight features, bonus never-before-seen preview pages, editorials from industry voices, and more in-depth, insightful and provocative comics coverage curated by David Brothers, Branding Manager at Image Comics.
Image+ is fans' premier source for all things creator-owned.
Table of ContentsFront cover: Kill or Be Killed #1Comic Lovers (IFC) - Story & Art: Brandon GrahamLetter From the Publisher - Foreward by David BrothersKieron Gillen & Jamie McKelvie: The Kings of Pop Comics Share Their Wisdom*Ed Brubaker, Sean Phillips, & Elizabeth Breitweiser: If You Had to Kill One Person A Month, Who Would You Choose? Why?*Kill Or Be Killed #1 - Story: Ed Brubaker / Art: Sean Phillips / Colors: Elizabeth BreitweiserJonathan Hickman: All Praise God Mammon.*The Black Monday Murders #1 - Story: Jonathan Hickman / Art: Tomm Coker / Colors: Michael Garland / Letters: Rus WootonNathan Fairbairn & Matt Smith: Aliens Meet Crusaders In Their Medieval Epic*Lake of Fire #1 - Story/Colors: Nathan Fairbairn / Art: Matt SmithAfar - Centerfold artwork by Kit SeatonMark Millar & Frank Quitely: Generations Clash As This Duo Turns Superheroics On Their Heads*Image Expo Showcase: Are You Ready For Your New Favorite Comics?Ronald Wimberly's Prince of Cats - An Extended Look At the Remixed Shakespearan EpicShop Spotlight: Comic Logic (Ashburn, VA)Industry Perspectives: The Face of Things to Come - Article by Esther KimBacklist HighlightsThe Walking Dead: Here's Negan!, Chapter 2 - Story: Robert Kirkman / Art: Charlie Adlard / Gray Tones: Cliff Rathburn / Letterer: Rus Wooton / Editor: Sean MackiewiczImage Comics August Checklist / Order FormBack cover: The Black Monday Murders #1Note: Titles in bold letters denote original content. Titles in bold and italic letters denote exclusive previews and first looks. Asterisks denote interviews. Everything else are articles unless otherwise noted.
